text: Alan Cumming OBE (born 27 January 1965) is a Scottish actor who is known for his roles in The Smurfs, Spy Kids, Son of the Mask, and in X2. He won an Drama Desk Award and an Tony Award. Cumming was born on 27 January 1965 in Aberfeldy, Perthshire, Scotland.Alan Cumming Biography (1965–). Film Reference.com. He studied at Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama. Cumming is openly bisexual.McQuaid, Peter. "The artful swinger – bisexual actor Alan Cumming – Brief Article – Interview." The Advocate. 28 September 1999. He was married to Hilary Lyon from 1985 until they divorced in 1993. He had been in a civil partnership with Grant Shaffer since 2007.
